Class ReplenishmentRequestLoader

java.lang.Object
org.CSPT.sc2001_grp1_proj1.dataLoader.ReplenishmentRequestLoader
public class ReplenishmentRequestLoader extends Object
The class handles loading, adding, updating, and managing replenishment requests from an Excel file.

  • Method Details

    • loadReplenishmentRequests

      public static List<ReplenishmentRequest> loadReplenishmentRequests()
      Loads all replenishment requests from the Excel file.
      Returns:
      a list of replenishment requests.

    • addReplenishmentRequest

      public static void addReplenishmentRequest(ReplenishmentRequest newRequest)
      Adds a new replenishment request to the Excel file.
      Parameters:
      newRequest - the new replenishment request to be added.

    • updateReplenishmentRequest

      public static void updateReplenishmentRequest(ReplenishmentRequest updateRequest)
      Updates an existing replenishment request in the Excel file. Updates are performed based on either the request ID or the medicine name and "New" status.
      Parameters:
      updateRequest - the replenishment request containing updated information.

    • generateNextRequestID

      public static String generateNextRequestID(String prevID)
      Generates the next unique request ID for replenishment requests.
      Parameters:
      prevID - the previous request ID to base the new ID on.
      Returns:
      a new, unique request ID as a String.
